section.name: BSF 3.0
section.p:
The release of BSF 3.0 Final is now available for
download. If you have any feedback on this release, feel free to join the discussion on the bsf-dev and bsf-user mailing lists.

section.name: BSF 3.0 Beta 3
section.p:
The third beta release of BSF 3.0 is now available for
download. If you have any feedback on this release, feel free to join the discussion on the bsf-dev and bsf-user mailing lists.

section.name: BSF 3.0 Beta 2
section.p:
The second beta release of BSF 3.0 is now available for
download. If you have any feedback on this release, feel free to join the discussion on the bsf-dev and bsf-user mailing lists.

section.name: BSF 3.0 Beta 1
section.p:
The first beta release of BSF 3.0 is now available for
download. If you have any feedback on this release, feel free to join the discussion on the bsf-dev and bsf-user mailing lists.

section.name: BSF 2.4.0
section.p:
The release of BSF 2.4 from Apache Jakarta is now available for
download. If you have any feedback on this release, feel free to join the discussion on the bsf-dev and bsf-user mailing lists.

section.name: Interested?
section.p:
If you want to participate in developing BSF, join the
bsf-dev mailing list and contribute your ideas.
